page.title: 06RECREATION IN STAINFORTH (2)
page.content: The major event in Stainforth is the annual Gala with which people of all ages can lend a hand and in return have a lot of fun. The Gala Queen is chosen from the teenage girls of the area, and there are always pictures and an account of the Gala in the local paper, the 'Craven Herald'. Langcliffe, Stainforth's neighbouring village also has an annual gala. Here, too, there are very few clubs or other activities, so many people travel to Settle for things such as Cubs, Guides and youth clubs. Settle also offers educational activities such as evening classes, ranging from computer appreciation to cheese making.
